## DeepPartial type

A recursive partial type. Useful for object that will be merged with defaults.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type DeepPartial<GType> = GType extends object ? {
    [K in keyof GType]?: DeepPartial<GType[K]>;
} : GType;
```
